item.title: Who am I?
item.description: I’ve been working in the industry as a software engineer and a consultant for almost a decade now in various deciplines. I mainly work with Go, Python, AWS/GCP and Orchestration (k8s/nomad) nowadays, but always on the lookout to learn new things. During my free time, I run my blog at datagenx where I share my learnings and tutorials to help developers around the world. ğŸ“ I blog here: https://www.datagenx.net/ ğŸ’¬ Ask me about Cloud, Orchestration (k8s/Nomad), Cloud Architecture, and Databases ğŸ“« Follow me on Twitter @datagenx and LinkedIn @atulsingh0 I can advise on - Still in learning mode for Few more tools where I spend most of my day -
